articles.author: Hafsa Adil
articles.title: All you need to know about the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023
articles.description: Ten teams vie for the 2023 ICC Cricket World Cup, hosted by India from October 5 to November 19.
articles.content:
International crickets biggest tournament is set to get under way in India on October 5.

articles.title: ECB wants to 'change game' to tackle discrimination
articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board says it is "on a journey to change the game" as it publishes a response to a report detailing racism, sexism, classism and elitism in the sport.
articles.content:
The Independent Commission for Equity in Cricket received more than 4,000 responses to its call for evidence

articles.author: Hafsa Adil
articles.title: India visa delay disrupts Pakistan’s Cricket World Cup 2023 preparations
articles.description: Pakistan Cricket Board cancels team bonding session in Dubai as it awaits Indian visa 10 days before the tournament.
articles.content: Pakistan cricket teams preparations for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 in India have been disrupted due to a visa delay that has delayed the sides departure for the event that gets under way in 10 da… [+2075 chars]

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
